

```{r}
job <- job %>% rename(Subject_ID = `Subject ID:`)

FOR <- FOR %>%
  rename(Subject_ID = subject_id)

id_group <- FOR %>%
  select(Subject_ID, group) %>%  # keep only those two columns
  distinct()      


job <- job %>% 
  filter(!str_detect(Subject_ID, "F[1-3]|f[1-3]|M[1-3]|m[1-3]|\\$R"))


job <- job %>%
  left_join(id_group, by = "Subject_ID")
```
